# init(delegate:)

**Initializer**

Creates an indirect Scribble interaction item with the specified delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init(delegate: Delegate)
```

## Parameters

- **delegate**: The object that acts as the delegate of this [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIIndirectScribbleInteraction-1nfjm] instance.
title: init(delegate:)
